## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
## files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Build results
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
[Ll]og/
*.log

# IIS Express
.vs/
*.vspscc
*.vssscc

# Packages
packages/
!packages/build/

# NuGet
*.nupkg
.nuget/
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/

# ASP.NET Scaffolding
ScaffoldingReadMe.txt

# SQL Server files
*.mdf
*.ldf

# Others
*.cache
*.dbmdl
*.bak
*.orig
*.tmp
*.temp
*.pidb
*.svclog
*.scc

# Publish
publish/
dist/
build/
node_modules/
wwwroot/
.env

# JetBrains Rider / ReSharper
.idea/
_ReSharper*/
*.DotSettings.user

# Windows image cache
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db

# Mac
.DS_Store

# Logs
*.log
logs/

# Azure
.csx/
*.azurePubxml
*.PublishSettings

# Backup & generated files
*.bak
*.backup
*.generated.*

# ASP.NET specific
App_Data/
App_Start/
App_Browsers/
App_Code/
App_GlobalResources/
App_LocalResources/
